![Quartz](Resources/Images/Quartz.png)
# Quartz Editor

Quartz IDE is a feature-rich tool for creating battler-based RPG and Dungeon Crawler Games!

This project is usable, but please be aware that it is in alpha stage, and, as a result, is bound to have bugs.

Please see the releases section to download a the latest version as an installer.

For support, please open an issue ticket or join our [Quartz IDE Community](https://discord.gg/MWHAnuN) Discord server. If you wish to support the grind, I have a [Ko-Fi](https://ko-fi.com/theheadmaster)! Your support is appreciated.
